Articles.Content: Now we might all know about the Kerbal Historical Institute mod, and how it brings back the old Mk1 Command Pod, along with all the other phased out variants of parts, but I was wondering if someone could create a custom IVA for it. I was thinking an IVA that had the fully furnished aesthetics of the Mk1 Lander Can, compared to the bare bones aesthetics that the Mk1 Command Pod we have now has. Do any modelers have some free time that they could invest into making a custom, 1 kerbal IVA for it, with the possible enlarged 3 kerbal IVA?
Bumping this because I would really like to see someone make this happen.
